products.name: MEMORY 24/7

The Immune System – Normal Muscle Function – Calcium Absorption for the development and maintenance of Strong Bones. Calcium intake, when combined with sufficient vitamin D, a healthy diet and regular exercise, may reduce the risk of developing Osteoporosis Development and maintenance of strong bones and teeth Muscle function. Cell division It is challenging to get enough of this important nutrient through diet and sunlight alone and in fact, in Africa it has been found that approximately 60% of the population has inadequate vitamin D. The good news is that vitamin D supplementation can be an effective way to fill this gap and give your body the vitamin D it needs.NeoLife Vegan D is a plant-sourced and whole-food proprietary supplement to help you get your daily dose of vitamin D-fence!
